title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Boil water in a large pot, adding a pinch of salt.
Once the water reaches a rolling boil, add the pasta and cook for about 6 minutes or until al dente.
Drain the pasta and rinse it under cold water to stop the cooking process.
In a pan Saute garlic in olive oil.
Add vegetables and cook for 5 to 7 mins.
Toss cooked pasta with vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
additionalTips: Add grated parmesan for extra flavor.

title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Saute zucchini noodles in olive oil for 3-5 mins.
Mix with pesto.
additionalTips: Use cherry tomatoes or pine nuts for garnish.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil water in a large pot, adding a pinch of salt.
Once the water reaches a rolling boil, add the pasta and cook for about 6 minutes or until al dente.
Saute onion and garlic
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add tomato sauce, simmer for 10 mins.
Combine with cooked spaghetti.
additionalTips: Add red chili flakes for extra heat.

title: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook pasta.
Melt butter, whisk in flour, and slowly add milk to make a roux.
Mix in cheese until melted.
Combine with cooked pasta.
additionalTips: Use breadcrumbs on top for a crispy finish. Bake for 5 mins if desired.

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine.
Melt butter, Saute garlic, add cream, and simmer.
Stir in parmesan.
Toss pasta with sauce.
additionalTips: Serve with parsley and a side of garlic bread.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Saute garlic and ginger in sesame oil.
Add vegetables, stir-fry for 5-7 mins.
Mix soy sauce with cornstarch, add to vegetables, and cook until thickened.
additionalTips: Top with sesame seeds or scallions.

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch.
Stir-fry beef until browned. Remove beef, stir-fry broccoli.
Add beef back, mix sauces, and cook until thickened.
additionalTips: Serve over rice or noodles.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry chicken until cooked through. Remove and stir-fry vegetables.
Mix sauces, add chicken back, and cook for 2-3 mins.
additionalTips: Use low-sodium soy sauce for a healthier option.

title: Tofu Stir-Fry
instructions: Pan-fry tofu until crispy. Remove, stir-fry garlic and vegetables.
Add tofu back with sauce, and cook until heated through.
additionalTips: Press tofu before cooking to remove excess moisture.

title: Shrimp Stir-Fry
instructions: Saute shrimp until pink. Remove and stir-fry vegetables.
Add shrimp back with sauces, and cook for 2-3 mins.
additionalTips: Add lime juice for a zesty flavor.

title: Veggie Wrap
instructions: Spread mayo on the tortilla, layer veggies, roll tightly, and slice in half.
additionalTips: Use whole-grain tortillas for added fiber.

title: Hummus and Veggie Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus on the tortilla, layer veggies, roll tightly, and serve.
additionalTips: Add a sprinkle of lemon juice for freshness.

title: Chicken Wrap
instructions: Spread ranch dressing on the tortilla, add chicken, cheese, and lettuce. Roll tightly and enjoy.
additionalTips: Warm the wrap for 30 seconds in a skillet or microwave for a softer texture.

title: Turkey Wrap
instructions: Spread mustard on the tortilla, layer turkey and veggies, roll tightly, and serve.
additionalTips: Use flavored tortillas like spinach or tomato basil for variety.

title: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Warm falafel, layer with veggies on the tortilla, drizzle tahini sauce, roll tightly, and serve.
additionalTips: Serve with a side of tzatziki or pickled vegetables.

title: Mug Cake
instructions: Mix ingredients in a microwave-safe mug. Microwave for 1-2 mins.
additionalTips: Add chocolate chips or a dollop of whipped cream on top.

title: Flourless Chocolate Cake
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter. Mix in sugar and eggs. Fold in cocoa powder. Bake at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 25 mins.
additionalTips: Dust with powdered sugar or serve with fresh berries.

title: Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Refrigerate for 2-3 hours or overnight until set.
additionalTips: Top with fresh fruits, nuts, or granola for added texture.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Combine all fruits in a bowl, drizzle with honey and lemon juice, and mix gently.
additionalTips: Use seasonal fruits for the freshest flavor.

title: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.
additionalTips: Add a handful of spinach for extra nutrients.

title: Green Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.
additionalTips: Use coconut water instead of almond milk for a lighter flavor.

title: Protein Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.
additionalTips: Add 1/4 cup oats for extra fiber and thickness.

title: Berry Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.
additionalTips: Add a pinch of cinnamon or nutmeg for warmth and depth.

title: Tropical Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve immediately.
additionalTips: Garnish with shredded coconut or a slice of fresh pineapple.

title: Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fry garlic and veggies, push to the side, scramble eggs, mix everything with soy sauce.
additionalTips: Use day-old rice for the best texture.

title: Kimchi Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fry kimchi, add rice and gochujang, mix, top with a fried egg, and drizzle with sesame oil.
additionalTips: Add leftover meat for more flavor.

title: Egg Rice (Tamago Gohan)
instructions: Crack the egg over warm rice, stir until creamy, and season with soy sauce and green onions.
additionalTips: Use pasteurized eggs for safety.

title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Cook rice with coconut milk, water, a pinch of salt, and sugar until fluffy.
additionalTips: Serve with curries or grilled proteins.

title: Bibimbap
instructions: Saute veggies, assemble rice in a bowl, top with veggies and egg, drizzle with sesame oil, and mix with gochujang.
additionalTips: Use leftovers for quick assembly.

title: Garlic Soy Sauce Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles, stir-fry garlic in sesame oil, toss noodles with soy sauce and garlic.
additionalTips: Add chili flakes for spice.

title: Ramen Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook ramen, stir-fry veggies, toss noodles with soy sauce and sesame oil.
additionalTips: Skip seasoning packet for a healthier dish.

title: Peanut Butter Noodles
instructions: Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic, toss cooked noodles with the sauce.
additionalTips: Add shredded carrots or cucumbers for crunch.

title: Pad Thai Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles, stir-fry with egg, toss with soy sauce and lime juice, garnish with peanuts and green onions.
additionalTips: Add a splash of fish sauce for authenticity.

title: Cold Sesame Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles, toss with sesame oil, soy sauce, and vinegar, chill, and sprinkle sesame seeds on top.
additionalTips: Serve with cucumbers for a refreshing touch.

title: Taco Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce, beans, corn, and tomatoes. Top with avocado, cheese, chips, and drizzle with salsa and sour cream.
additionalTips: Use ground beef or chicken for a non-veg version.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Combine chopped cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, and olives. Top with feta and drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.
additionalTips: Serve with pita bread for a complete meal.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, parmesan, and dressing.
additionalTips: Add grilled chicken for extra protein.

title: Grain Bowl
instructions: Layer grains, roasted veggies, and chickpeas in a bowl. Top with avocado and drizzle with tahini dressing.
additionalTips: Use any leftover grains for a quick base.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
instructions: Stir-fry chicken in 1 tbsp oil until browned and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add 1 tbsp oil, garlic, bell pepper, onion, and pineapple, cooking until softened.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, vinegar, ketchup, sugar, and cornstarch slurry.
Add sauce to the pan with chicken, stirring until thickened.
additionalTips: Serve over rice or noodles. Use pre-chopped veggies for convenience.

title: Veggie Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add spinach, bell peppers, and tomatoes, cooking for 2-3 minutes.
Pour in eggs, tilting the pan to spread evenly. Add cheese on one side, fold the omelette in half, and cook until set.
additionalTips: Use your favorite vegetables for variety. Pair with toast for a complete breakfast.
